alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 414 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kings Point, or near Delray Beach, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Highland Beach, Ocean Ridge, Coconut Creek, Parkland, Lantana, Mission Bay, Boca Pointe, Boca Del Mar, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Village Of Golf, Whisper Walk, Kings Point, Dunes Road, Loxahatchee NWR and Hypoluxo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
